Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.themes

Services for handling themes, including templates and stylesheets for pages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHttpTemplateFunction
    Custom template functions that are designed for use within HTTP call processing can implement this interface and register the implementation as an OSGi service.
    IPackage
    Base interface for packages of theme-related files.
    IStylePackage
    Represents a package of style sheets that can be applied to a specific template package.
    IStyleSheet
    Represents a style sheet that can be applied to static or dynamic content, generally targeting specific templates.
    ITemplateData
    Data set for merging into a template.
    ITemplateDictionary
    Simplification of the dictionary interface to provide template-friendly access to translations with no formatting parameters.
    ITemplateFile
    Represents a template for dynamically-generated content.
    ITemplateFunction
    Custom template functions can implement this interface and register the implementation as an OSGi service.
    ITemplateHash<K,V>
    Container for a key-value dictionary in a template dataset, that can transform arbitrary key types into key types as expected by the template system, with a fluent API for adding items.
    ITemplateItem
    Simplification of the data structure interface to provide template-friendly access to cell data.
    ITemplateList<V>
    Container for a sequence of values in a template dataset, with a fluent API for adding items.
    ITemplatePackage
    Represents a package of templates for a specific type of template system.
    ITemplateSystem
    Provides and manages a specific type of templates, using a specific type of technology.
    IThemeService
    Provides access to template systems.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StyleMediaFeature
    Enumeration of W3 CSS3 media features, for creating media queries with visual theme CSS style sheets.
    StyleMediaType
    Enumeration of W3 CSS2 media types, for use with visual theme CSS style sheets.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnsupportedThemeOperationException
    Thrown by template system implementations when a modification is attempted on an unmodifiable package, or when the implementation has been stopped within the OSGi framework.
    UnsupportedThemePackageException
    Thrown by template system implementations when requested to open an incompatible theme pack.

Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.themes Description

Services for handling themes, including templates and stylesheets for pages.
Since:
1.0
